languages.text: {n}Воздух вокруг замер в напряженном, почти наэлектризованном молчании. Вся знать — кто со страхом, кто в трепетном ожидании — ждет вашего вердикта...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Воздух вокруг замер в напряженном, почти наэлектризованном молчании. Вся знать — кто со страхом, кто в трепетном ожидании — ждет вашего вердикта...{/n}

languages.text: {n}The air in the room is frozen with a tense, almost electrified silence. All the nobles — some with fear and others with reverent anticipation — await your verdict...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Воздух вокруг замер в напряженном, почти наэлектризованном молчании. Вся знать — кто со страхом, кто в трепетном ожидании — ждет вашего вердикта...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The air in the room is frozen with a tense, almost electrified silence. All the nobles — some with fear and some with awe — are awaiting your verdict...{/n}

languages.text: {n}室内の空気が緊張で凍りつく。ピリピリとした静寂だ。すべての貴族が…ある者は恐怖し、またある者は畏敬の念を抱きながら、あなたの評決を待っている…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The air in the room is frozen with a tense, almost electrified silence. All the nobles — some with fear and others with reverent anticipation — await your verdict...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}室内の空気が緊張で凍りつく。ピリピリとした静寂だ。すべての貴族が…ある者は恐怖し、またある者は畏敬の念を抱きながら、あなたの評決を待っている…{/n}

languages.text: {n}会场的空气似乎被一触即发的紧张寂静冻住了。所有贵族都带着或是恐惧、敬畏与期待的表情，等待着你的最终判决……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The air in the room is frozen with a tense, almost electrified silence. All the nobles — some with fear and others with reverent anticipation — await your verdict...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}会场的空气似乎被一触即发的紧张寂静冻住了。所有贵族都带着或是恐惧、或是敬畏的表情，等待着你的最终判决……{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'atmosphère devient presque électrique tant la tension est palpable. Tous les nobles attendent votre verdict, certains visiblement terrorisés, d'autres fascinés...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The air in the room is frozen with a tense, almost electrified silence. All the nobles — some with fear and others with reverent anticipation — await your verdict...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'atmosphère devient presque électrique tant la tension est palpable. Tous les nobles attendent votre verdict, certains visiblement terrorisés, d'autres fascinés...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un silencio tenso inunda la habitación. Los nobles, algunos con miedo y otros expectantes, aguardan tu veredicto...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The air in the room is frozen with a tense, almost electrified silence. All the nobles — some with fear and others with reverent anticipation — await your verdict...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un silencio tenso inunda la habitación. Los nobles, algunos con miedo y otros expectantes, aguardan tu veredicto...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein angespanntes, fast elektrisiertes Schweigen liegt in der Luft. All die Adligen erwarten dein Urteil, manche angstvoll, andere ehrfürchtig ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The air in the room is frozen with a tense, almost electrified silence. All the nobles — some with fear and others with reverent anticipation — await your verdict...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein angespanntes, fast elektrisiertes Schweigen liegt in der Luft. All die Adligen erwarten dein Urteil, manche angstvoll, andere ehrfürchtig ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Odada gergin, hatta heyecanlı bir sessizlik oluşuyor. Soyluların bir kısmı korkuyla, kalanları da hürmetle kararını açıklamanı bekliyor...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The air in the room is frozen with a tense, almost electrified silence. All the nobles — some with fear and others with reverent anticipation — await your verdict...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Oda, gergin hatta heyecanlı bir sessizliğe bürünüyor. Soyluların bir kısmı korkuyla, diğer kısmı hürmetle kararını açıklamanı bekliyor...{/n}
